column4: I need some help getting a Xircom RBE-100 PCMCIA Network card to work on feisty is shows that it knows what card it is but when you look at the actual adaptor it shows nothing
I need some help getting a Xircom RBE-100 PCMCIA Network card to work on feisty is shows that it knows what card it is but when you look at the actual adaptor it shows nothing
run "sudo lshw", and put the output on pastebin.ca
